arts.ttl: Scottish Premiership: Predictions for all four weekend games
arts.sum:
There are a trio of games on Saturday as top-of-the-table Hearts and Celtic bid to protect their 100% records, while Rangers head for a Sunday lunchtime test at St Mirren with boss Russell Martin under intense scrutiny already. 

We are looking ahead to all four games in the Scottish Premiership this weekend, with a score prediction for each one.
